name: Help Me Finish My Game!
description:
A short game created to test a visual novel implementation of the Narrative Tree (or NTree) custom macro for SugarCube 2. Includes conditionally displayed trees, and a dialogue choice with accompanying differing text.

Characters in the game are various real people (and me) from the Twine Discord server. The game itself mainly consists of jokes and references about these people. Come visit us if you're interested in using Twine!

(Note: There's one joke that might come across as inappropriate or harassing, but it's based on a recurring joke between the real human counterparts of the characters who do it all in good fun. There's truly no harm done between them.)
